item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: Using Python in SDS348 Weâ€™ve imported python code into RMarkdown files, such as this one. We used reticulate to allow R and python to talk to each other in python code chunks. Below is some work from HW assignments. The following is my solution to the problem: Write a function that takes a string of nucleotides as input and returns a dictionary with all 3-mers present in that string, and the number of times that each 3-mer occurs.
